Package client

Class BasicClientListener

java.lang.Object
client.BasicClientListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientListener
public class BasicClientListener extends Object implements ClientListener
Implementation of the ClientListener interface. This class is responsible for connecting the client to the TUI.

    • receiveError

      public void receiveError()
      Description copied from interface: ClientListener
      Delegates to the TUI to handle an error received from the server. Virtually just prints the error, because the server removes the client anyway.
      Specified by:
      receiveError in interface ClientListener

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • connectionLost

      public void connectionLost()
      Description copied from interface: ClientListener
      Handles the connection loss event in the listener. Removes the listener from the client.
      Specified by:
